title: Butter Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, half the ginger-garlic paste, chili powder, turmeric, and salt for 30 minutes.
Heat 2 tbsp butter in a pan and cook chicken until done. Set aside.
In the same pan, add remaining butter and saut√© onions until golden.
Add remaining ginger-garlic paste and cook for a minute.
Add tomato puree and cook for 10 minutes until oil separates.
Add garam masala, kasuri methi, and sugar.
Add cooked chicken and simmer for 5-7 minutes.
Serve hot with naan or rice.
notes: For a richer flavor, you can use cashew paste in the gravy. Marinating overnight gives even better results.
